healthtags.config.screen.title: Health Tags Config
healthtags.config.renderer_screen.title: Configuring '%s'
healthtags.config.setting.enabled.toolti: Enable or disable the rendering of health tags.
healthtags.config.setting.show_on_self.t: Render the health tag on yourself.
healthtags.config.setting.extra_height.t: Adds extra height above the player's name tag.
healthtags.config.setting.target_hold_ti: Keep rendering the health tag for an additional X seconds after the player has stopped looking at them.
healthtags.renderer.heart.tooltip: Render the player's health as hearts.
healthtags.renderer.heart.setting.hearts: The maximum number of hearts per row.
The number of pixels to space the hearts by on the X axis.
The number of pixels to space the hearts by on the Y axis.
healthtags.renderer.percentage.tooltip: Render the player's health as a percentage.
